===================
What's New in 1.1.5
===================

------------
New Features
------------

#. 增加各种组件布置图的可视化功能；
#. 增加对称性是否满足的自动检查逻辑；
#. 增加每个组件的轴向功率分布可视化功能；
#. 增加能群平均的Dancoff因子可视化功能；

---------
Bug Fixes
---------

#. 7fa3125: NAN should not be annotated when use nonzeros comparation
#. 0da163f: incorrect dancoff factor edited if resonance region is divided to mutli cells
#. c2d238a: invalid mesh generated by unfilled region geos intersecting with mesh geos
#. 916bce4: DIRECT model bug, use steady conduction
#. 1bc86fa: modify MIN_CELL_SIDE_LENGTH 0.05 -> 1e-6 to fix tiny triangle cell bug for cmfd
#. 613d457: MAX_NUM_SIDE_PER_CELL = 8 is not enough for same hexagonal cases, so set it 10
#. dc32b3e: pad_map error when padding hexgonal map
#. 7745aae: thread not safe to insert a global variable
#. a755ce6: modified Cooltable & fluidprop bug
#. 5b6035e: add coolprop table routines, and modified pip bug
#. 9df1478: incorrect statepoint time statics
#. 6159e5f: _z_mesh_bot_fraction computation error, which cause bad axial offset
#. e4696fe: peak value patch color not consist with real peak value color
#. f69d677: if openmc-denpent lib not installed, OSError raised
#. 880fc7c: add test Yaml and repair bug
#. edabce4: incorrect day time point calculated if power ratio less than 1.0
#. 2ac9103: burnup point now do not contain 0.0
#. f0cabc8: library reading error when number of nuclides changed
#. 3e99e5c: format error
#. 29b4f12: critical boron can not search down to zero
#. 54e2fb5: printing head not align
#. 134fa38: all-nan error when none interesting data found
#. c2d7c40: bugs accurred when is_plane_xs_generator=true
#. dc6a0d0: core symmetry should be token account in total heavy metal accumulation
#. f0055de: moc mesh flux key error
